snippet.title: [ANOMALY TAPES]: Beyond Reality - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
🔗 Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3145780?utm_source=source 🔗

Step into the eerie world of '[ANOMALY TAPES]: Beyond Reality,' a PS1-style retro Analog horror game that takes you on a spine-chilling journey through a series of events. Each tape you find brings you closer to uncovering a dark secret, but beware—the anomalies are always lurking.

#analoghorror #anomaly #tapes #beyondreality #indiegame #indiehorror #indie #gametrailers #teasertrailer #horrorgaming
